name: Umami-Soy Glazed Beef & Tomato Rice Bowl
step_by_step: Rinse rice until water runs clear; cook with 1:1.2 rice-to-water ratio for fluffy grains.
Flash-sear beef sirloin (2 min/side) in smoking-hot pan, rest 5 min, then slice thin against grain.
Caramelize onion over medium-low heat 8 min until golden; add ginger & garlic for 30 s.
Deglaze with soy, mirin, and tomato juice; reduce to glossy glaze.
Fold in diced tomato off-heat to keep fresh pop; finish with sesame oil & scallion.
Layer rice, beef, onion-tomato glaze; garnish with scallion.
